# inertia

**Instance Property**

The inertia in kilograms per square meter.

## Declaration

```swift
var inertia: SIMD3<Float>
```

## Discussion

The vector contains the diagonal elements of the diagonalized inertia matrix.

## Getting mass properties

- **mass**: The mass in kilograms.
- **centerOfMass**: The position of the center of mass and the orientation of the principal axes.
